title: butter bread
description: An unusual seafood salad topped with a creamy anchovy dressing and crisp croûtons.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a deep-fat fryer and a food processor.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz mussels, steamed and mussel meat removed
10 brown anchovies plus the oil from the tin, preferably Natoora or Brindisa
1 jar capers, preferably Lilliput capers, drained and rinsed
large bunch rosemary, leaves removed, finely chopped
extra virgin olive oil, to serve
